data.name: Address_AddressLine1Required
data.value: The 1st line of an Address is required.

data.name: Address_CityRequired
data.value: An address must have a city.

data.name: Address_CountryRequired
data.value: An address must have a country.

data.name: Address_ZipCodeRequired
data.value: An address must have a zip code.

data.name: Courier_NameMaxLength
data.value: Courier name must be a string with a maximum length of 64.

data.name: Courier_NameRequired
data.value: A courier must have a name.

data.name: DeliveryAddress_AddressNameRequired
data.value: A delivery address must have a name.

data.name: DeliveryAddress_FirstNameRequired
data.value: A delivery address must contain your first name.

data.name: DeliveryAddress_LastNameRequired
data.value: A delivery address must contain your last name.

data.name: Order_CreatedDateRequired
data.value: Order must have a created date.

data.name: Order_OrderNumberLength
data.value: Order number must be a string with a maximum length of 64.

data.name: Order_ReceivedDateRequired
data.value: Order in Received status must have a received date.

data.name: Order_RetailerRequired
data.value: Order must have a retailer.

data.name: Order_StatusExtendedLength
data.value: Order extended status must be a string with a maximum length of 64.

data.name: Order_TrackingNumberLength
data.value: Tracking number must be a string with a maximum length of 64.

data.name: Order_WeightRequired
data.value: Order in Received status must have a weight.

data.name: Package_NameLength
data.value: Package name must be a string with a maximum length of 64.

data.name: Package_NameRequired
data.value: A package must have a name.

data.name: Profile_FirstNameLength
data.value: First name must be a string with a maximum length of 64.

data.name: Profile_FirstNameRequired
data.value: First name is a required field.

data.name: Profile_LastNameLength
data.value: Last name must be a string with a maximum length of 64.

data.name: Profile_LastNameRequired
data.value: Last name is a required field.

data.name: Retailer_CategoryLength
data.value: Retailer category must be a string with a maximum length of 64.

data.name: Retailer_CategoryRequired
data.value: A retailer must have a category.

data.name: Retailer_DescriptionLength
data.value: Retailer description must be a string with a maximum length of 1024.

data.name: Retailer_NameLength
data.value: Retailer name must be a string with a maximum length of 64.

data.name: Retailer_NameRequired
data.value: A retailer must have a name.

data.name: Retailer_UrlLength
data.value: Retailer url must be a string with a maximum length of 256.

data.name: Retailer_UrlRequired
data.value: A retailer must have a url.

data.name: Role_DescriptionLength
data.value: Description must be a string with a maximum length of 64.

data.name: Role_NameLength
data.value: Name must be a string with a maximum length of 64.

data.name: Role_NameRequired
data.value: A role must have a name.

data.name: User_EmailExists
data.value: This user already exists.

data.name: User_EmailLength
data.value: Email must be a string with a maximum length of 256.

data.name: User_EmailRequired
data.value: An user must have an email.

data.name: User_PasswordLength
data.value: Password must be a string with a maximum length of 64.

data.name: User_PasswordMinLength
data.value: Password must be a string with a minimum length of 7.

data.name: User_PasswordRequired
data.value: An user must have a password.
